attributes.action: I would like a tougher sentences for those that commit serious crimes..
attributes.additional_details: Many victims that lose their lives leave love ones behind to cope with their lost love ones and those that Survive there aldeal have to live with the truma for the rest of their lives it affects love ones and it affects the victims .. justice needs to be served for the victims and there families...  and thoses that commit other serious sexual offences should also face much longer sentences too and to be tagged so they can be monitored as well ..
attributes.background: I would like the government and Parliament to hand a full life sentence for taking a life .. if you take a life it should be you face life means life behind bars no good behaviour get out early of jail no half sentence if you commit attempted murder or murder in the first degree you stay behind bars

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Replace life sentences with whole life terms for the most serious offenders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732705
